commands.name: play
commands.description: Play a song from a search query.

commands.name: playnow
commands.description: Stops current playback, clears the queue, and immediately plays the specified song.

commands.name: sourceplay
commands.description: Play any media from a YouTube URL or query.

commands.name: playlist
commands.description: Play any playlist from a YouTube playlist URL.

commands.name: skip
commands.description: skip the current song and play the next one.

commands.name: stop
commands.description: Stop the playback and clear the queue.

commands.name: disconnect
commands.description: Disconnect the bot from the voice channel.

commands.name: sitelist
commands.description: Lists the websites from which you can play audio. Currently only from YouTube.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Displays the help message with available commands or detailed info for a specific command.

commands.name: join
commands.description: Connect the bot to the user's voice channel.

commands.name: volume
commands.description: Set the volume level or return the current volume if no value is provided.
